website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate trainer that  takes the guesswork out of learning the right golf swing mechanics.
pros: Designed for use just about anywhere
Endorsed by over 20 PGA training pros
Ideal for those who want to perfect chipping or full-swing skills
Great choice for those who enjoy daily practice
cons: Can be hard to figure out how to use

customer_reviews.title: Forward Shaft Lean Teacher!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect from this product but I was having so many problems at the bottom of my swing, I was frustrated bc I was a Scooper instead of having forward Shaft Lean when I hit the ball, weak and high with no distance, after using the Impact Snap on a Consistent bases, I’ve learned how not to take the club so far back and also how to keep my hands stable from wanting to cast the club so early, now my ball flight is penetrating with some adding distance, if you are having the same issues I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barbershop33

customer_reviews.title: Great product but only if you prefer practice with it.
customer_reviews.text: It works, but you have to practice with it. Do it for like a minute every day. Combine it with one arm swings with the Orange Whip and you'll feel how to let go and release the club through impact - relaxed, club face square, forward shaft lean, lots of lag. I found this really helped me develop a high follow through with lots of power and control. I do practice a lot with it, and I admit a lot of improvement came with practicing with the Hanger, which allows you to hit balls.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Has Worked For Me
customer_reviews.text: I am a 16 handicap. My problem has always been approach shots. I can get the drive in the fairway most of the time, but just can't hit greens consistently. 2 weeks of work with the ImpactSnap, along with hours at the range (I just semi-retired) and I shot 37-43 (8 over) at my club course. I hit all clubs better, had a lot of birdie putts and am excited for the future. This training aid helped me feel solid contact and the release.
customer_reviews.author: Dyno

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to use in the house or office (though the ...
customer_reviews.text: The position your wrists get to at impact will feel strange and incorrect, but then you look at the Konica Minolta Swingvision videos and sure enough everyone who plays for $$$ on Saturday and Sunday gets in this position. Well made and easy to use in the house or office (though the "click" noise might bother your wife or coworkers). Has helped my impact and ball flight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevinmr

customer_reviews.title: It's too easy to do and not like swinging an actual club ...
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, but not worth the money. It's too easy to do and not like swinging an actual club where the weight of the club pulls my wrist into a casting motion. In real life, I tend to cast with my 5 iron not my wedges. On the plus side, it's well made and doesn't require much room to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sunset

customer_reviews.title: Worth twice the price!
customer_reviews.text: Looking back at this purchase, it's more valuable than a $100 bill. In fact, it should be twice that amount for the benefit it brings. I've bought some gadgets in the past trying to help my swing, but nothing has ever provided more benefit so quickly than the Impact Snap. It's a stroke of genius!!
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: There are good videos the explain it better tha I can here
customer_reviews.text: After 30 years of golf, I now understand the RELEASE! After trying to flip at contact, this shows what a real release is. Would you think rolling the left knuckles rolling under at contact is the correct release? Me either! It takes some thought and practice, but it starts to make sense when you think about all the instructors that tell you the hands need to be ahead of the club head at contact. There are good videos the explain it better tha I can here.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brown

customer_reviews.title: A great portable golf swing aid
customer_reviews.text: It takes discipline to get the most out of a training aid like this. Sometimes I have it, sometimes I don't. But I take it on the road with me because it fits neatly into my suitcase. And I stay in touch with my swing basics when I don't have my clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: This had helped improve my swing. I now understand the proper position of the hands in the swing, this had helped me to strike my irons much better.
customer_reviews.author: d from the Ville

customer_reviews.title: Tempo leads to power (distance)
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought anything online to improve my golf swing. Let alone review but I tried this at a resort driving range and came home and bought it. No BS it has settled and steadied my tempo which has dramatically increased my distance. Just try it... simple and the ability to use indoors was the key for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: An okay tool for teaching release
customer_reviews.text: I guess it does what it's supposed to but the little cylinder gets stuck inside the handle. Personally I feel it's not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I am a 10 handicap and struggle with consistency with my driver. The first day I got this thing I took it to the range. I spent an hour switching between impact snap and hitting balls. It gave me the feedback to confidently hit bombs where I wanted with accuracy to stay in play. The impact snap will be a permanent part of my practice.
customer_reviews.author: j. terry

customer_reviews.title: Grip was tacky...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to trying this golf aid. But when I gripped the handle, the grip was tacky and felt like it was sticking to my hands...like old, degrading rubber. Had to scrub my hands to get the tackiness off. Not sure how long this has been sitting in the stock room or if that’s how it’s designed. Getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: PGutz

customer_reviews.title: Surrender to the device and videos!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 14 handicap. I used this device in conjunction with a smash bag. I followed the videos step by step and by day 4 I saw big improvements in shot consistency and distance. I've never been a low handicap player so I can't speak to improvements for good players, but for me this is a game changer. So much confidence!
customer_reviews.author: jamepalm@iupui.edu

customer_reviews.title: Warned up with it before a round and shot 78 ...
customer_reviews.text: Warned up with it before a round and shot 78.,,try it what do you have to loose? a few strokes?
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Great aid
customer_reviews.text: Been very happy with the product. I feel like my leg is getting better and I’m coming inside out better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good feel through hitting zone and finish
customer_reviews.text: If flip at the ball through impact this device can be useful. But probably not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: C. Wichmann

customer_reviews.title: But the results so far have been very good.
customer_reviews.text: I am still drilling with this device. But the results so far have been very good.
customer_reviews.author: John Susie

customer_reviews.title: Strictly a training aid
customer_reviews.text: The impact snap trainer did improve my wrist cock and hand position at impact. My chipping has improved as well. However, there weren't any instructions, video or even a link to the website included in the packet. You have to go on-line to find them. I think if it was built into a full length club, you would get a better feel.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Swing
customer_reviews.text: Best way to show anyone how to line up your swing
customer_reviews.author: jestimator

customer_reviews.title: Get the Impact Snap
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, portable, great for grooving a repeatable impact position! Has helped my game significantly.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product is a little pricey, however, it does teach the release point of the golf swing maximizing club head speed. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Training Aid
customer_reviews.text: awesome training aid. is best to watch the YouTube videos for quick instructions
customer_reviews.author: Jim P01

customer_reviews.title: Amazing training device, best out there for a striker.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a better player and really need a device to keep you in the groove, use this...
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: ... would say this is for a 10 handicap or better
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is for a 10 handicap or better
customer_reviews.author: Justin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Why is the handle square?
customer_reviews.text: Just received and haven't used yet so not a review of the effectiveness. However, I'm curious why the handle is square when all golf clubs are circular?
customer_reviews.author: Palenaka

customer_reviews.title: Helped a ton!!
customer_reviews.text: Never knew just how bad my hands were through impact til I got this gem. Worked wonders for forward shaft lean & compressing the ball
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: Practice your swing anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to use with online or video golf lessons. Can take a full swing in your house. Snap should be in front of your left pocket on downswing. Will add muscle, conditioning and if done with lessons helps swing and lowers handicap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I personally found directions lacking. Viewed sales video and ...
customer_reviews.text: I personally found directions lacking. Viewed sales video and figured it out. All in all helpful aid.
customer_reviews.author: ml

customer_reviews.title: Best training aid
customer_reviews.text: If you use this diligently will help put your club on the correct path to hitting longer and more consistent shots. Not a miracle cure you still need to practice practice practice.
customer_reviews.author: John Matlack

customer_reviews.title: Great idea though
customer_reviews.text: Still unsure if this has helped or hurt my golf game. Great idea though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t worked as well as I’d hoped, but right idea
customer_reviews.author: Postie

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are less than adequate. Really need to view the video on you tube.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what I expected.  Rating expectations a little difficult.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it a little over 24 hrs. Haven't really used it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great training aid. If you’re looking for something to get you in the correct Golf position order it now.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Help my son-in law's golf game
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my son-in law. He says it really helped with his golf game, and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: francis j. tiscavitch

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I DON’T work for Impact snap. I received this yesterday. I swung it quite often last night and this morning, then went out played 18 and it had immediate impact with my accuracy and power. I watched the seven impact snap lessons which are very brief and simple and then briefly practiced what they taught and had immediate results. Crazy good device.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Limberger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably, although I bought this product to help me with my general swing, it helped cure my chipping yips.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: You will need to watch a video on proper use of the device
customer_reviews.text: Very simple compact training aid. Will quickly help golfers develop a better impact position.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Aide
customer_reviews.text: Provides immediate feedback and feel to how to set and maintain a good set before impact and how to release the club after impact.
customer_reviews.author: Chipsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great and Simple Training Device
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Actually improved swing after using it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer1000

customer_reviews.title: ... is starting to make a sufficient difference in getting better solid contact
customer_reviews.text: I swing it everyday and it is starting to make a sufficient difference in getting better solid contact.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you want to play good golf!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: The problem I had with the device was that I ...
customer_reviews.text: The problem I had with the device was that I found no improvement in my swing after using the device. I watch all the available videos on it use, but they did not result in improvement. What I think is needed is to use the device with professional help to enable taking the principles the device teaches to the course.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Instant feedback on how you are swinging the club. ...
customer_reviews.text: Instant feedback on how you are swinging the club. If the yellow ball is not touching your forearm then you are swinging incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best training aid I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Reopell

customer_reviews.title: After I went on their website and watch the video ...
customer_reviews.text: After I went on their website and watch the video on how do use it I found it very helpful and very instructive .at this point to use it on a regular basis
customer_reviews.author: Willis Rutz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Just watch some videos on how to use it...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Santa

customer_reviews.title: Give It A Try. Hope It Works Better For You Than Me
customer_reviews.text: I found this training device hard to figure out and use. It gets rave reviews on the PGA Tour Radio and other golf media but I could not figure this out. I followed the online directions but to no use. The company was kind enough to accepts a return.
customer_reviews.author: Robert DeMarzo

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid for scoopers and flippers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device because I enjoyed Kelvin Miyahira's blog and youtube videos. After a few minutes with this device i was finally able to feel the proper hand positions at impact. I was somebody who flipped/scooped the clubface through impact and as a result i hit really high and weak shots. Not good for someone who lives in the windy desert climate of Las Vegas. I still struggle with the occasional scoop/flip but this device has reduced that issue significantly. Now if only i could learn the proper hand path I probably wouldn't shank so much...is there a device for that?!
customer_reviews.author: J-FullTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great aid but I'm not a fan of the square grip shape
customer_reviews.text: The grip is not 100% comfortable to me. If they could make a version with a rounded grip vs a square grip, then it would be perfect! Still gets 4 stars simply because of its effectiveness as a training aid.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: No!  I don't like it
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't flow nicely. Awkward to swing and teach anyone to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Cielak

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been a 3.4hc and believe EVERY GOLFER should have this training aid, most are useless, this one has Marit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Michalski

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job at grooving your swing. Outrageously expensive, however.
customer_reviews.author: golfer

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have watched the videos and worked with this thing and see no benefit. A waste of money. I am a 4 handicap and perhaps it could help a higher handicap golfer, but I see no benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Missing how to use instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but no directions or CD included to show how to use. Had to go on line to find out how to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ImpactSnap is a golf training device that delivers!
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with proper wrist action and an over-the-top swing for several years. My golf pro recommended the ImpactSnap and the results have been excellent. I've spent a lot of money on training aides that were worthless. This is the exception to the rule. Used properly, it will improve your ball striking and swing path issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: is not helping yet, but I remain optimistic or maybe just crazy!
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: He's using it and feels like it's helping
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He's using it and feels like it's helping.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Bear

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate like I did.
customer_reviews.text: I am a single digit handicapper who has struggled with inconsistent ball compression at impact. This impact trainer gives me the kinesthetic feedback to help me teach myself proper impact. I hesitated to spend the money, but now happily consider the investment well worth it. Its genius cannot be overstated...training ball under right forearm at impact and the "snap" as far left (for right handed golfer) as possible. It will change the way you think about impact. My handicap has dropped almost 2 strokes over the last 20 rounds, mostly due to the unexpected surprise at how much the Impact Snap has helped me with my short game.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not easy to do . I couldn't figure it out. I have been playing golf over 50 years most of that as a single digit handicapper. Go to the range and practice . None of these things work. I wasted my money . Again!
customer_reviews.author: windy1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Its great tool tool but you'll need to find the online videos to help you understand how to use it properly. Been using this for a week & can't wait to see the impact on my golf swing
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Najmi

product_meta.title: IMPACT SNAP Golf Swing Trainer and Practice Training Aid - Right Handed
feature_bullets: Golf Digest's Best Training Aids for Golf 2019 - For the fourth year in a row, the IMPACT SNAP is named golf's 'best full swing training aid' by Golf Digest. Practice anytime, anywhere with the only swing tool that trains for speed with the proper wrist conditions

ACHIEVE THE PERFECT IMPACT POSITION EVERY TIME - The IMPACT SNAP teaches a muscle memory pattern that forces you to adopt proper release mechanics. Seamlessly train your wrists to fire the three movements essential to a proper golf swing: Ulnar Deviation, Flexion, and Supination

ALL NEW CLUBHEAD ATTACHMENT (sold separately) - Now the IMPACT SNAP provides more precise visual feedback as you square the clubface at impact. With the new attachment you can see how the wrists affect the clubface throughout the entire golf swing. A must for more visual learners. CLUBHEAD SOLD SEPARATELY

CREATED & ENDORSED BY PGA PROFESSIONALS - 22 top-100 instructors are teaching with the award-winning training aid. Including: Mike Bender, Hank Haney, Bobby Clampett and inventor, Kelvin Miyahira. Fix your impact and change your game forever

SAY GOODBYE TO EXPENSIVE LESSONS - The IMPACT SNAP, developed by 4-time PGA Section Teacher of the Year, Martin Nowicki helps golfers feel perfect impact and compression. Resolve leading to quick improvement when used every day until improper mechanics are a thing of the past
